characters.name: MARI
characters.description: Väike inimene, umbes 5-aastane tüdruk. Tal on lühikesed pruunid juuksed ja suured sinised silmad. Kannab punast pikkade varrukatega särki ja siniseid pükse. Tal on alati lahke ja uudishimulik näoilme. Armas multifilmistiil.

characters.name: PEETER
characters.description: Väike inimene, umbes 6-aastane poiss. Tal on lühikesed blondid juuksed ja suured rohelised silmad. Kannab rohelist pusa ja pruune pükse. Tal on rõõmsameelne ja abivalmis näoilme. Armas multifilmistiil.

locations.name: LASTETUBA
locations.description: Cozy children's playroom with light blue painted walls, a warm wooden floor, and a single large window on the back wall showing a snowy garden with bare tree branches outside. There's a small round wooden table in the center with two small chairs. A colorful rug covers part of the floor. Soft, warm light comes from the window and a small, friendly-looking lamp on a corner shelf. Cartoon style.

locations.name: LUMINE AED
locations.description: Snowy garden with a thick blanket of fresh white snow covering the ground and bare tree branches. Several tall, bare trees are visible, dusted with snow. A small, sturdy wooden fence marks the garden's edge. The sky is a soft, pale blue, indicating a crisp winter day. The ground is pure white snow. Cartoon style.

pages.scene: Mari and Peeter are sitting at a small round wooden table in their cozy playroom. Mari looks thoughtful, and Peeter is looking out the window, which shows a snowy garden. The room has light blue walls, a wooden floor, and a colorful rug. Warm light fills the room. Both children wear their usual clothes. Cartoon style.

Mari and Peeter are still at the wooden table. Mari points towards the window with a concerned but kind expression. Peeter nods, looking at her, understanding. Through the window, the snowy garden with bare trees is visible. The children wear their usual clothes. Cartoon style.

Mari and Peeter are at the wooden table in their playroom. Mari holds a mixing spoon, stirring a colorful mixture in a large bowl. Peeter watches intently, holding a small bag of seeds. The table has some ingredients scattered, like a small block of butter and loose seeds. The room is light blue with a wooden floor. The children wear their usual clothes. Cartoon style.

Close-up on the wooden table where Mari and Peeter are making bird food. A block of butter and a pile of bird seeds are visible next to a bowl of mixed ingredients. Mari is adding seeds from a small scoop into the bowl. Peeter smiles, holding a smaller bowl of seeds ready to add. The children wear their usual clothes. Cartoon style.

Mari and Peeter are now carefully shaping small, round balls from the bird food mixture. Mari is gently rolling a ball between her hands. Peeter is holding a freshly formed ball, looking proud. Several finished bird food balls are visible on a small plate on the wooden table. The children wear their usual clothes. Cartoon style.

Mari and Peeter proudly hold up their finished bird food balls. Mari holds one in each hand, smiling brightly. Peeter holds one large ball with both hands. More finished balls are on a plate on the wooden table behind them. The children wear their usual clothes. Cartoon style.

Mari and Peeter are now bundled up in warm winter coats, hats, and gloves, standing by the open back door of their house, looking out at the snowy garden. They are holding a small basket filled with the bird food balls. They look excited to go outside. The interior of the playroom is visible behind them, matching its description. Cartoon style.

Mari and Peeter are outside in the snowy garden. Mari is carefully hanging a bird food ball from a branch of a snow-dusted, bare tree. Peeter is reaching up to another branch, preparing to hang another ball. Snow covers the ground and branches. They are wearing warm winter coats, hats, and gloves. Cartoon style.

Several small, colorful birds are happily pecking at the bird food balls hanging from the snow-dusted tree branches in the snowy garden. Mari and Peeter are standing a short distance away, watching the birds with delighted smiles. They are still wearing their warm winter clothes. Cartoon style.

Mari and Peeter are standing together in the snowy garden, giving each other a high-five, beaming with pride and happiness. The bird food balls are visible hanging on the tree branches behind them, with a few birds still feeding. The snowy garden looks peaceful and bright. They are wearing their warm winter clothes. Cartoon style.
